divs: Sighting DetailsI am a Flight Attendant for a private charter airline that fly's DC9's for NCAA teams. On March 13th around 1:00pm I was traveling with my crew (empty flight) out of Northwest Arkansas Airport. We had departed during a storm with heavy clouds and wind. When we broke through the clouds, I was amazed with what I had seen above the storm. We were at approximately at 20,000 ft. when I start taking the pictures. I was sitting in the first row with no obstructions. In the photo's you will see a large object that was not visible to my eyes. I was simply snapping away at the sun and beautiful cloud formations. When I was looking at my pictures later in the day, I couldn't believe what I saw. I have looked at the pictures hundreds of times. I thought that it may had a been a reflection from the wing but I was too far in front of it. If you notice the object is up and to the far left. I have searched for over a month to find anything that may resemble what was in my pictures. I truly believe that they closely match the NASA images!
Summary: Picture of object taken from a DC9 aircraft at approx 20, 000 ft.
Object Shape: Circle, Cylinder, Disc, Sphere, Other, Unknown
trends: There has been one other sighting in Blytheville
There were no other sightings in Blytheville on or around March 13th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
